entry.title: Current Conditions: -0.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Lake Superior Provincial Park 5:00 PM EST Sunday 19 February 2023

Humidity: 93 %

entry.title: Sunday night: Flurries. Low minus 22.
entry.summary: Flurries ending this evening then partly cloudy. Local amount 2 cm. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming north 20 then light late this evening. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 7. POP 40%
entry.summary: Sunny in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries late in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 27 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Local amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 near midnight. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 13 in the evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Sunday 19 February 2023
